searchUrl:
<js> 
//Ê≥®ÊÑèÔºö‰∏ÄËà¨ÁΩëÁ´ôÈªòËÆ§È¶ñÈ°µ(Âç≥baseUrl)ÊúâÊêúÁ¥¢Ê°ÜÔºåÂê¶ÂàôËØ∑Â°´ÂÖ•ÊêúÁ¥¢È°µÈù¢Âú∞ÂùÄ
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‚ÄºÔ∏èËØ∑Â°´ÂÖ•Ê≠£Á°ÆÁöÑUrl‚ÄºÔ∏è\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//Ê°åÈù¢ÁâàUA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//ÊâãÊú∫ÁâàUA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //ËØ∑Ëá™Ë°åÈÄâÊã©UAÔºå‚Üì‚Üì‚ÜìÂ°´ÂÖ•Ê≠§Â§Ñ
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

header:
<js>

  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "Á¨¨‰∏ÄÂç∑ÔºöÈªòËÆ§"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
      source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
      java.toast("ËØ∑ÊåâÁÖßËßÑÂàô‰øÆÊîπÊ∫êÂèòÈáèÔºåÂ∑≤ÈáçÁΩÆÊ∫êÂèòÈáèÔºÅ")
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
    source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
  }
  let header = {
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; MI 8 Lite Build/QKQ1.190910.002) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/113.0.5672.62 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "ismobile": 0
  }
  if(variable.cookie){
    header.cookie = variable.cookie;
  }
  JSON.stringify(header)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.page.author
ruleBookInfo.kind: <js>let data = JSON.parse(src).page; let tag; switch(data.status){case 0: tag = "ÂÆåÁªì";break;case 4: tag = "ÂÆåÁªì";break;case 1: tag = "ËøûËΩΩ‰∏≠";break;case -1: tag = "Â∑≤Êñ≠Êõ¥";break;default: tag =  "Â∑≤‰∏ãÊû∂";} let tags = JSON.parse(data.categoryV2); tags = tags.map((t) => {return t.Name}); tags.unshift(tag); tags</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.page.bookName

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "Á¨¨‰∏ÄÂç∑ÔºöÈªòËÆ§"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = `https://fanqienovel.com/reader/${c.itemId}?enter_from=page&force_mobile=0`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

var info = doc.select(".detail-list").select(".detail-list-item");

result = info.last().text()
</js>
